IntApp Going Virtual
At ILTA 2008, we announced the virtualization of our entire product line. Clients are continuing to make the transition to IntApp's virtualized, software-only product line.
Through the end of the year, IntApp is offering a Hardware Buy Back Program to encourage clients to make the move and reduce their hardware footprint. For more information, please email Neal.Vora@intapp.com.
Virtualizing Firms: Fenwick & West LLP Fraser Milner Casgrain LLP Ogletree, Deakins, Nash, Smoak & Stewart, P.C. Nelson Mullins Riley & Scarborough, LLP Ulmer & Berne LLP
Quick Survey for IntApp IT Clients
We'd like to invite all of our customers to take a quick poll on your firm's IT plans and purchasing priorities as the end of 2009 draws near. Participants need not provide their names, but those who do will receive a copy of the report sharing aggregate data. To take the survey, visit http://www.surveymonkey.com/s.aspx?sm=GshrMlKVV_2bFjfe9iaxDT2w_3d_3d.
IntApp Webinar -- Integrating Elite 3E Into Your Environment
Please join IntApp and the IT team at Ballard Spahr for a webinar on Elite 3E. Many firms are looking to migrate to Elite 3E, but have questions about how best to integrate this significant upgrade into their existing environment. This webinar will explore how IntApp can help firms make the move seamlessly and painlessly.
At this event, Lisa Mayo, Frank Callan and Terry Hornung from Ballard Spahr will discuss their experience migrating to Elite 3E and how the firm is using IntAppâ€™s Integration Builder to quickly integrate the system into their existing environment and automate business processes including new personnel intake.
Date: Friday, October 30 Time: 9 am Pacific / 12 pm Eastern
To register, visit www.intapp.com/reg/3Ewebinarregister.html.
Introducing Wall Builder 4.0
IntApp is pleased to announce the newest release of Wall Builder. Wall Builder 4.0 delivers significant product enhancements including:
New security enforcement models, including "Contractor Walls."
An integrated confidentiality policy generation wizard
A new reporting dashboard
User interface enhancements
ILTA 2009
IntApp had a very strong presence at ILTA this year. We had 13 team members attend and we sponsored both TV channels. We would like to extend a big thank you to the following firms for participating in videos this year:
Davis Wright Tremaine LLP Faegre & Benson LLP
We have a spare conference t-shirt. If you would like it, email Lea Simon at Lea.Simon@intapp.com. The first person to respond will get it.
We connected with many firms at ILTA, and saw several familiar faces and plenty of new ones. The highlight of the week was our annual wine tasting event, where we hosted about 100 guests. A slideshow of the event is available at: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u9fFC6Xk0Gw.
"Not @ ILTA" Webinar Series Recap
Because many law firms had a reduced presence at ILTA this year, we held a "Not @ ILTA" webinar series for IT professionals who were not attending Conference. Topics covered were: Business Process Management & Workflows, Attorney Provisioning, Distribution List Management and an introduction to Wall Builder 4.0.
A recording of the Business Process Management & Workflows session is now available on our website at http://www.intapp.com/products/ibwebinars.html.
We also held an iPod Shuffle raffle for webinar attendees. Congratulations to the raffle winner, Paul Miller at Dorsey & Whitney!
IntApp at Upcoming Hildebrandt Events
IntApp will be at many conferences and tradeshows this fall. Upcoming events include:
The 8th Annual Law Firm COO & CFO Forum October 21-23
The 8th Annual Law Firm CIO Forum November 19 Pat Archbold, VP Risk Management Practice, will be moderating a panel on the role of technology in managing confidentiality and risk. Panelists include: Sam Suri, Director of IT Matters,Jim Kannengieser, Director of Enterprise Applications at Dewey & LeBoeuf, and Ann Ostrander, Senior Director, Firmwide Loss Prevention at Kirkland & Ellis.
The 8th Annual Law Firm General Counsel Forum December 2-3 IntApp will be sponsoring a Breakfast Briefing on the evolving trends in law firm compliance featuring DLA Piper General Counsel, Bill Campbell and McCarter & English General Counsel, Bill Reilly.

Washington, DC User Group October 23, 11am Hosted by Hogan & Hartson

IntApp Customer Community Updates
We are pleased to announce that the Customer Community has been updated! The community now has a technical forum as well as a general discussion forum for each of our three product lines. Visit the Customer Community at https://www.intapp.com/community/index.php.
The Customer Community is a valuable resource for our clients who want to connect with other IntApp users or get the latest IntApp news. If you do not have an account on the Customer Community but you would like one, please contact support@intapp.com.
